column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My boyfriend and I loved our experience here. All staff were friendly and kind to us. The food was incredible. The restaurant itself had a lovely ambience. We put our names in and walked the river walk (which is about a block away) while we waited a hour for our table (it was so worth the wait). We got the rib eye steak
column5: baked sweet potato and carrot cake for dessert. Thank you Bavette for reminding us how special dinner dates can be!
